article_html:
White House spokesman Josh Earnest said Tuesday that the investigation on the Garland, Texas exhibition shooting is not yet conclusive about a link between the shooters and the Islamic State or other terrorist groups.

Earnest said: 'The thing that we can say definitively is that because of the brave work of local law enforcement officers, a terrorist attack was foiled'
text:
White House spokesman Josh Earnest said Tuesday that the investigation on the Garland, Texas exhibition shooting is not yet conclusive about a link between the shooters and the Islamic State or other terrorist groups.



Earnest said: 'The thing that we can say definitively is that because of the brave work of local law enforcement officers, a terrorist attack was foiled'
title: White House: it's too early to tell if Texas gunmen were linked to Isis – video
